INVOKE.COMMENT: *** GET TEST DATA-- Disable this step if you are testing thru the SOAP message handler ***

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: STEP 1 -- Extract data from SOAP Request Message

INVOKE.COMMENT: 1.2--Query the Body node to extract the required values

MAP.COMMENT: 1.3--Map extracted values to the document format expected by business logic

INVOKE.COMMENT: 3.1.1--Convert document representation of Body entry to a String of XML
3.1.2--Convert String of XML to an XML node
3.1.3--Add node to Body of SOAP messge
3.2.3--Convert document representation of header entry to an XML String
3.2.4--Convert String of XML to an XML node representation of header entry
3.2.5--Add node to Header of SOAP message
STEP 4 -- FOR DEBUG ONLY. Convert finished SOAP message to String for viewing ***
